website_summaries.verdict: Earning high marks for its impressive durability and fast transfer speeds, the helpful data recovery software is another nice feature of this model.
pros: SanDisk's microSDXC card is designed for the high-speed 4K video technology of modern devices, and has excellent picture clarity
Transfer speeds of up to 100MB per second means pictures and video can be moved to laptops and other devices quickly
Included RescuePro Deluxe software easily recovers any data deleted by the accidental push of the wrong button
Designed to protect data if the disk is dropped or becomes wet, it is also durable enough to retain data through airport X-ray machines
An adapter for use in devices without a microSD reader is included
cons: Customers who want to create long 4K videos may need a card with more space than is offered in this model

customer_reviews.title: Fake, don't buy knockoff
customer_reviews.text: This is a knockoff. The pictures and print on the packaging are blurry. The packaging says Extreme Pro but on the card itself it only has "extreme" but you can clearly see the word "plus" with black paint over it. They ate selling extreme plus cards as Pro cards. Too bad I waited a month before trying to use this, I am outside of the return window now and have to deal with this piece of junk. Another reviewer has provided photos.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Either Counterfeit or Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I should have listened to the negative reviews about this product. I was either sent a counterfeit SanDisk, or a defunct card. The advertisement for the 64gb card is, "up to 100MB/s read speed; up to 60MB/s write speed." In actuality, here are the tests (USB 3.1): WriteTest: QT 1: 11.04 QT 2: 10.855 QT 3: 11.040 QT 4: 9.938 ReadTest: QT 1: 19.563 QT 2: 18.232 QT 3: 18.68 QT 4: 18.232 This card received U3 designation, meaning the card can sustain at least 30MB/s continuous write speed and makes the card suitable for 4K video recording. This card, however, fails at that quite miserably.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER, THE CARD IS COUNTERFEIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look close enough and mistakenly ordered from this 3rd party seller and not SD/Amazon and got a counterfeit card. I ordered this card for my DJI Mavic Pro and when I received it, the print on the packaging looked slightly blurred. When I opened the cardboard, there was no film keeping the card and adapter in the plastic insert. The San Disk paper marketing materials for their data recovery offering were also not included, even though the packaging says you can find them "inside." The print on the card also did not resemble my actual SD card. The adapter almost didn't fit my SD card reader. This isn't the "New Version." It's the counterfeit version.
customer_reviews.author: G.Damanis

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my GoPro Hero5 Black
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new GoPro Hero5 Black and it has been working flawlessly so far. I reviewed many other cards and brands before deciding on this particular card. Based on price, feedback and other website reviews, I've decided this would suit my needs. I haven't had any problems yet so no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast, just beware of fakes.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the reviews about fakes I took a chance and ordered two open box cards from Amazon Warehouse. I figured worst that happens is I have to use Amazon's ez pz return process. I was worried when I opened them and the printing on the cards was kind of dull but they tested out as the fastest cards I've ever seen. I got 68 MB/s write and 86 MB/s read consistently on both cards so I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Great performance with heavy Android apps
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to store apps from my Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge. Everything works great and I have no noticeable delay when launching apps, including 1GB games and heavy Gear VR apps.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: The memory card is Great. Don't buy it for the RescuePro software
customer_reviews.text: The memory card is Great. Don't buy it for the RescuePro software. It doesn't work. They want you to send them your disk, drive..etc. so they can charge you for retrieval service.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Super fast compared to the non-Extreme versions!
customer_reviews.text: These Extreme editions are FAST! I had a SanDisk 64GB microSDXC UHS-I Card boasting up to 80MB/sec. When installing the latest Raspian image to it I was getting maybe 15-20MB/sec. On the Extreme edition I was getting about 60-65MB/sec. While not the "up to 100MB/sec" they advertise it's still tons faster than the non-Extreme versions. Huge difference too with the Raspberry Pi booting up on it. Will be getting Extreme editions from now on!
customer_reviews.author: W. Westlake

customer_reviews.title: Very fast card and excellent storage capability. Recommended for GoPro users!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent card for my GoPro Hero 5 Black. Plenty of storage. I can get 4 hours and 38 mins of recording on 4K UHD or 5 hours 38 mins on 2.7K. Speed is awesome with video being silky smooth and very responsive. Thoroughly recommended to anyone wanting some great MicroSD storage.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie the Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Can't record long duration 4K video on GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: Not fast enough for my GoPro Hero 5 Session when recording in 4K. After 20-30 minutes, the camera stops recording and tells me it's trying to repair a damaged file, then offers to reformat the card. I bought this specifically because it claimed it was fast enough for 4K video, and it's not. I don't know if I have a dud one, or if they're all this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tomblin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Fitting on the Mavic Pro drone was easy. the drone took off well, but 10 secinds into flight it started juddering badly. I quickly brought the drone in fear of causing damage to it. Checked the propellers and the mountings of the guards very carefully, and took off again. Same problem. Just to rule out any problem with the drone itself, removed the guards and took off. Everything was normal. So mounted the guards and took off for the 3rd time. Again juddering. Clearly juddering is caused by some issoe with the guards. Am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Anupam Gupta

customer_reviews.title: All my music on a postage stamp
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting years for the technology to reach this point, and it's finally here. I digitized my entire (400+) CD collection as FLAC, stored it all on this tiny little guy, and stuck it in my Motorola Z Force Droid. It did take some time to push all that data onto the card, but now I have all my music available at all times. Simply awesome. Card works perfectly for this use and have had no issues. I have pulled it out of my Droid a few times to push data onto it from my computer's SD card slot without incident. Very pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Needed to upgrade to "EXTREME" in order to capture 4K video footage. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Needed a new MicroSD card to capture 4k video. The previous card I had (Class 10) couldn't keep up! Camera would keep turning off while recording. I didn't realize they made better SD Cards for 4K video. Works perfectly. Just FYI - you don't necessarily need to pay the premium if you're just looking to snap photos or record 1080p.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A.

customer_reviews.title: This card crashed as soon as I reached 119 GB in data, just as others warned
customer_reviews.text: This card crashed as soon as I reached 119 GB in data, just as warned would happen with counterfeit SD cards. All of my memory was dumped, and I am unable to recover it, even after trying 3 different recovery software suites (of of which includes Stellar Premium, which retains for $200+). I thought I was safe buying only from "Amazon" as a Seller, but apparently, they are losing their grip on quality, and focusing on quantity, without independent verification. I'm sure SOME people have been getting genuine Sandisk cards from Amazon, but I am not one of those people, and I just lost 4 years of work as a result. Buy once (direct from the manufacturer) and cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: High capacity, high speed, fair price
customer_reviews.text: It still amazes me how storage capabilities have changed so much over the last two decades. This is a very compact card with a huge amount of storage (not even the largest, but plentyful) and a very good read/write speed. It is perfect for smartphones and action cameras due to its size and capabilities. But since it comes with an SD adapter. It will fulfill most of your storage needs. I have found SanDisk is a great brand overall.
customer_reviews.author: Spartano15

customer_reviews.title: Terrible in Galaxy S9+ and my Windows/MacBook Pro 2017
customer_reviews.text: Well the screenshots says it all. I performed the same benchmark with my MacBook pro 2017 and my Windows laptop and the results on random r/w are the same. I do not recommend this card for a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Sophos

customer_reviews.title: Quality, HIgh Speed Storage for phones are cameras!
customer_reviews.text: This is the microSD memory card that you will want for your phone! For $29.99, you get 64GB of memory in this very fast V30 format. It will allow you to record movies without a hiccup. Also good for cameras too! This is a big increase of storage for a normal 16GB Android phone. I bought one for me and for the wife too! Sandisk Quality. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: CL scientist

customer_reviews.title: Great flash media
customer_reviews.text: Using in my Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet for additional storage space (so I could save $$ on the device itself). Seems to be working great. Have had excellent luck/results SanDisk flash media over the years. Have many for my digital camera as well as thumb drives. All perform well and hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect in GoPro Hero 6 Black
customer_reviews.text: The Real Deal! I am using three of them with my GoPro Hero 6 black. Tried every resolution and frame rate settings out and it is flawless. Make sure you CHECK THE SELLERS RATINGS BEFORE YOU BUY. If they dont have 100’s of good reviews or have a only a handfull they probably are selling fake cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: The memory card was working absolutely fine for a month, and then out of nowhere it stopped working. i lost over 100gb of pictures! it cant be read. This is dissappointing. I am still traveling, and im trying to get a replacement or a refund , and just not working out, amazon cant help since im not in the country and sandisk now wants me to spend almost the cost of a new card to ship it to them! This has never happened before, so im surprised as well, i only use sandisk, and im not sure what to do. wasted card, lost precious memories, lost my money for now!
customer_reviews.author: gobind nagrani

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money to protect your memories
customer_reviews.text: This is something that I reccomend paying a higher price for. These cards are what hold your photos and memories on them and buying a subpar product could lead to issues down the road. These are tried and true and will stand the test of time. Work perfectly in my GoPro and will continue to purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne S.

customer_reviews.title: It's fast
customer_reviews.text: It works great as expected with my gopro hero 2018 camera; sometimes the quick recording functions freezes the camera but I don't think it's related to the card, instead of that it could be a problem with the camera firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rodas

customer_reviews.title: Generally pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Generally pleased with this purchase. I discovered that this model actually works much better in my older GoPro cameras (i.e. 3+). There is not nearly as much heat buildup while using this item versus the many high end Samsung micro SD cards I'd previously purchased. The Samsung have similar performance ratings but this card significantly reduced the heat and allowed for longer camera use. I just wish the pricing on these things were a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Possible fake and defective
customer_reviews.text: The 128gb card only reads 23gb. It will not format to anything larger. Also, this card is possibly a fake knockoff that is branded as an official Sandisk. (green back instead of black) The speed are much slower than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Danesp

customer_reviews.title: The packaging says A1 but the SD card is actually A2
customer_reviews.text: Beware that packaging says A1 but the SD card is actually A2. I have heard so many problems with newer A2 SD cards and I purposely decided to buy the older A1 version. To my surprise when I received it. The card is actually V2 even though the packaging still says A1.
customer_reviews.author: Henry RC Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good some concerns with GoPro
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. However I did knock off a star because GoPro no longer recommends it for the Hero 6 which is why I bought it. I've read that for some that there is an issue once you get to 100GB and that you might not be able to use the last 28. I'm not sure if that's why GoPro removed it from their recommended list but that is a concern. However the same product in 64 and 32 is still recommended so I will continue purchasing those.
customer_reviews.author: Springer Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Slow card error
customer_reviews.text: After using for more than a month i can say this card is crap, i get slow card errors when it is warm less than 90 out and it freezes my camera. Maybe i just got a bad one maybe not getting speeds around 19mbs
customer_reviews.author: Caine Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gopro Hero 6
customer_reviews.text: Very good memory card. This is the one gopro recommends for its cameras. Since I just bought one recently I added this to my car.. and I can see why. This SD Micro card is waterproof, temperature proof and shock proof. No wonder its perfect for gopros. It comes with an adapter for the computer. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with GoPro Hero 4
customer_reviews.text: This card will not record video on a GoPro Hero4 Black camera. I suspect it is a cheap knock off card as it does not contain the same card color scheme of Re and Gold/Yellow that my other SanDisk cards have. My weeks worth of offroad trip video does not exist. Camera gave no indication that the card wouldn't work. Probably should have tried it at home first!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speed tested and very hapoy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my Samsung Gear 360 camera (2017 edition). I placed it in my Samsung Galaxy S9+ to speed test first though. With write speeds of almost 70MB/s and read speeds of close to 90MB/s I think it will get that 4k 360 video just fine. With 119 GB of usable storage (on my Galaxy, because android OS uses a percentage of the storage space for directory and system files) it shows close to 10 hours of video recording time. Considering that's 4k 360 video that's quite ample storage space.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fast and furious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gamecard for my Nintendo Switch. I just plugged it in the console, it made an udpate and it was ready to go. This is one of the fastest memory cards in the market. The price is great, I got it half the price of what it's sold on average on the country (50USD+) and it works perfectly. Reading and writing times are super fast. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Corrupting Files
customer_reviews.text: My GoPro kept corrupting files, and it took me a while to narrow the problem down to this SD card. I think it was just a bad one in the batch because I bought the same card from Best Buy and am having no more issues. I'm way past the return period though, so I'll just have to toss it. Would not recommend getting them off here.
customer_reviews.author: Pryce B.

customer_reviews.title: No issue shooting 4k video
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Shoots 4k video at 30fps seamlessly and doesn't ever get interupted. I use this for my Phantom 4 Pro + and it does exactly what I want it to. Capture amazing 4k video! It transfers quickly to my computer which is perfect for when we are traveling the world to different countries filming. (We are travel cinematographers.) I recommend this card and will be buying 2 more very soon for a trip to the Philippines!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Boersema

customer_reviews.title: Awesome read/write speeds
customer_reviews.text: On my Galaxy S9+ I'm getting 65MB/s write speeds and 85MB/s read speeds. A big step up from 14/35 on my previous sandisk 128GB card. Very happy. With the 238 GB of usable storage (android system always uses a percentage for file directory and system files) plus the almost 39 GB of internal storage I have free I'm pretty well set for storage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Package and card don't match
customer_reviews.text: What is going on here? I purchased both A1 and A2 version, the A1 version not only doesn't look like the black card as advertised, it's actually the same as the A2 version but the package shows it's an A1 version with slower speed? I can't believe SanDisk would make such a mistake, is this even a legit SanDisk product???
customer_reviews.author: Alan H

customer_reviews.title: Provides More Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my older 32 GB SD card quit working in my Samsung S7 phone. After I installed it, I found an app to move applications to the new SD card and gained 10 GB more storage in my primary phone memory. Great way to add more apps without upgrading your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm thinking about buying more and keeping them on hand for temporary backups and the like.
customer_reviews.text: I used to only use 64GB cards in my devices but figured I should move up to 128GB since they are supported. So far I haven't had any issues at all (unlike my 64GB cards). I'm thinking about buying more and keeping them on hand for temporary backups and the like.
customer_reviews.author: SoCaliTrojan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, it is junk
customer_reviews.text: We get disk errors and will not format. This also came UPS that required a signature, hard to do when you work hours of delivery. Spend a little more money and buy at the store. Didnt want to waste anymore of my time by sending it back for the little bit of money i spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lubrano

customer_reviews.title: Not original or knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and very slow with my drone. Not the original SanDisk. Update :Totally stopped working
customer_reviews.author: S.E. ENT.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in case something happens to one while on a trip/I ran out of room.....and I can proudly say I haven’t needed the second one yet. This guy takes a lot of videos without running out of space.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk?  'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for use in a smart phone. Fabulous so far. Went with the fastest possible memory speed to minimize the time required for the camera app to reset for a another image capture. SanDisk has been around a very long time. Never had a issue with any solid state data storage device from them.
customer_reviews.author: JustaDudeTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Fast and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it for my GoPro Hero 5 Session. No issues and fast.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: I'd say it's pretty reasonable. Hopefully it will prove reliable but fortunately
customer_reviews.text: I used this without issues on my Mavic Air, for both video and 100 bps, and also for photography. For the amount of storage at that price, I'd say it's pretty reasonable. Hopefully it will prove reliable but fortunately, the Mavic Air also has internal storage for emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a microSD card with at least 128GB of storage space with fast & stable performance for my Autel Evo drone and this Sandisk Extreme card fit the bill perfectly~! With powerful specifications such as A2, V30, and U3, this is the perfect card for action cameras and drones. Good stuff, Sandisk~!!
customer_reviews.author: optimummind

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Card - Lost Data Today - Came as an A2 not as the pictured A1
customer_reviews.text: Lost photos on a drone shoot today and finally figured out that these cards are counterfeit. This is what happens with counterfeit memory. It looks like a 64GB card, but after 4GB, you start losing data. Stay Far Away!
customer_reviews.author: rsvp

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my drone and camera to take 4K video and have had no problems. I have tried using the none extreme cards and always get an error that the card is to slow. They are also cheaper than the full size extreme cards and work just as well in my Sony A7 III.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Still works after being bent by the postman
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far. Will see how they survive inside my kids GoPro sailing trip. I'm impressed so far since the packages were completely mangled after being literally crammed into my mailbox with other items. One of them even looked bent but it still seemed to record and playback fine on the test usage. Will update my review later if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Great card, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using scandisk cards for years in my digital cameras. This card was purchased for my MavicAir drone. It has worked great so far and is fast enough to record 4k video. I only shoot at 2.7k so the 64GB is fine. If you are planning at shooting at 4k definitely get a larger capacity SD card or buy multiples.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Even if it is prime! Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: The first use of the 128gb on my GoPro was alright but in the second use it kept reading sd card error. It is not worth to buy because it’s a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Great for GoPro cameras, the ONLY card for ALL GoPros!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my GoPro Hero 4 silver and couldn't be happier! Seems to be working great so far and offering quite a good read speed on my MacBook Pro. I have only used SanDisk Extremes for my GoPro and they have all given me no problems, plan on buying more of these too. Thanks for a reliable and fast product. Also, please do your research before purchasing micro SD cards as some people are buying SanDisk Ultras for their GoPros. These cards ARE recommended but the other cards are not. From GoPro's website: "SanDisk Extreme/Extreme Plus/Extreme Pro UHS Video Speed Class 30 (V30) - ≥32GB". This card is the ONLY card for ALL GoPros.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a GoPro Hero 5 which I was using a previous card out of my Hero 3 and getting the issue of recording for 15 seconds and then getting a memory error. Totally was due to that older card. This one is the proper specs and so far I've filled it up quite a bit with no issues. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hellmer

customer_reviews.title: Mine was real
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I purchased this product since I was running out of room on my phone. I did buy the extreme 128gb micro sd card. I was worried about some of the negative reviews regarding the fakes that have been sent and decided to get one anyways. I checked out everything and it is a legitimate Sandisk card.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Piccone

customer_reviews.title: Hero 7 Black
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with a. I have done 4K 60 FPS, Time Warp, Photos, Burst and it has been working without any problems so far. It seems to be fast enough to keep up with the camera, even at the highest video resolution, and no corruption so far. Update: I has been almost a year now and it is still working well!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne FTop Contributor: Scuba Diving

customer_reviews.title: A Genuine San Disk
customer_reviews.text: I was initially a little concerned about receiving a genuine San Disk micro sd card after reading some of the one star reviews. However the card I received was the real deal. After testing the card it either met or exceeded the advertised specs. A genuine San Disk micro card at a great price. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Walt E

customer_reviews.title: Test/Use it as soon as you get it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as extra. I already have another sandisk 128gb. I never tried to use this item until I needed it and I was already out of the country for a vacation. Well, it was not working. My Hero6 is getting card read failure. Tried it on my macbook, same problem. My mistake is my confidence and trust that I get good product and will just work like everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Bernardez

customer_reviews.title: The difference in price isn't that great to make a difference in buying these over the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cards. They are primarily used in my Drones for some awesome 4K footage. They haven't had an issue with keeping up with camera input. They seem durable and have actually been through a few laundry cycles. Of course not intentionally, but they make it through and I haven't noticed a performance issues at all. I would HIGHLY recommend these for anyone who does video or photography.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast, Lots of storage, Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Other than it provided additional storage, I cannot even tell it is there. Integrates into my tablet perfectly. I would purchase this again. (128 GB is the max. my tablet supported. I would have purchased a larger one if it would have worked. Still, 128 GB is plenty of additional space for books, podcasts, pictures, and some live video.) Very pleased with SanDisk.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Broesder

customer_reviews.title: A very high performance microSD card for 4K video capturing
customer_reviews.text: This is very economically priced and worked well for 4K video recordings at 30fps. Best for those 4K cameras and/or drone cameras that can do 4K resolution recordings
customer_reviews.author: Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: SanDisk is the only thing I will be purchasing from now on. I bought the Samsung 128gb and it worked for a day or 2 then started giving me problems for my GoPro Hero 5. I would not save the files of my ride to work on my Motorcycle. You definitely need to have footage of your ride when on a motorcycle due to all those ppl that don't pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: wayland yung

customer_reviews.title: Genuine....
customer_reviews.text: Wish SanDisk would just clearly write out the Read and Write Speeds besides using all the marketing wank and logos. This is the third card I've bought and all were good for my DJI FPV system.
customer_reviews.author: EXRyan

customer_reviews.title: Test immediately upon arrival if intented for use in a GoPro!
customer_reviews.text: Does not perform as advertised. Was not able to get rated video out of my action camera with this card. Purchased in anticipation of getting action cam and was not aware of issue until after return window. I highly recommend you put your card through the paces as soon as you receive it to ensure you haven't gotten a lemon. Doubly disappointed as this was a card that GoPro specifically stated would be capable of high def/high frame-rate capture.
customer_reviews.author: Elton Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my GoPro Hero 5 Black. I get just over 8.25 hours of recording time now at 1080p, 60fps, about 4 hours and 20 minutes at 4K, 30fps
customer_reviews.author: TradClimber91

customer_reviews.title: if you need one, this works great
customer_reviews.text: need the 128's now a days, this is dependable brand and the speed i needed and the price equaled or better than what's out there, added it with an order i already had and saved me a trip to micro center or staples ... and no stinking tax!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lauron

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I use these for trail cameras, they are in the woods from Feb/March until Nov/Dec and I have never had any issues. The storage is great and ample, never had a card fail from elements.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great SD card for my cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Been using this Micro SD card on my cell phone for about 2 months now. So far it is working very well and quite fast in transferring files and saving photos.
customer_reviews.author: John Chua

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, easy to Transport, excellent Speed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the performance of the MicroSD card. This is my fourth one as I truly love the speed and durability. Does the job very well and high recommend this for any purpose that calls for a microSD disk. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Craver

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This SD card was what was specified by my action camera. It’s not a generic SD card and it’s specifications were exactly what the manufacturer of my action camera requires.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Mihlfeld

customer_reviews.title: Irresponsible
customer_reviews.text: irresponsibility. I got A2 instead of A1. dissatisfied with the fact that lost time to return and waiting for a new one Are you guys kidding me? Seriously? again A2 instead of A1.
customer_reviews.author: John King

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine recording at 4k x 30 on my Mavic Air
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the SanDisk Extreme Pro 64gb for my Mavic Air. That card wasn’t available so I bought this one. SanDisk Extreme 64gb. Worked fine recording at 4k x 30 on my Mavic Air.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: i was worried about getting a fake card, based on the reviews here. luckily, i think that i was fine. the 128 gb holds up to 7 hours of footage.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi N.

customer_reviews.title: Used once, Not extreme at all.
customer_reviews.text: could not find how to contact seller thru amazon. Sold by amazon services.com Ink. I bought it to last, but I had only one use in my go pro. it worked fine, I was able to down load my pics. Months later....nothing, it is not even recognized by camera, laptop, nothing. Pretty much a waste of money, my time, and my trust in amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for GoPro and general purpose camera filming
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this microSD for my GoPro Hero 6 where the camera had unfortunately had to be returned due to manufacturing defect. I've been using this card however in my DSLR for the past year and half without issue. It's great for overflow photos!
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very good SD card, reliable and reads/store fast. One year and counting usign it and no problems using it with my GoPro Hero 5 black.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar R.

customer_reviews.title: ... 128 gb micro sd and it is a really bad copy of a real one
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 128 gb micro sd and it is a really bad copy of a real one. It does not work as intended and it only erased all my data when I saved it. I can see brand was printed over other kind of micro sd and also I found package opened. This thing deserves 0 stars, but I have to put at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cordoba

customer_reviews.title: Good companion for GoPro and Mavic Air
customer_reviews.text: Needed inexpensive but good performing memory for GoPro and Mavic Air recording and I've been using SanDisk Extreme memory for years. This card holds up and keeps up with the streaming demands of my cameras. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rake

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my new (used) GoPro  camera, it was on the recommended microSD card list.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a micro SD card for my new Gopro camera. This was one that was on their recommended/approved list. No issues at all, works as designed. I didn’t even notice that it came with the adapter, but it did and I should’ve seen that in the details so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Winds

customer_reviews.title: Not the product advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a knockoff card. Does not record @ 100MB/s like advertised, Put it into my DJI Mavic air, it got stuck and was continually warned that it was a 'slow' sd card. Formatted it many times, switched to 4k and started recording to be surprised with slow, jumpy recording.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Gurney

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when buying - Photo is misleading and write speed is slow
customer_reviews.text: The write speed was only 75 mb/s plus the photo shows Extreme PLUS but it is not. Read the caption it is only Extreme. Please get rid of the misleading photo.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan edgington

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dashcams
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase for a dashcam. The card writes too slowly to support dashcam use.
customer_reviews.author: James Y

customer_reviews.title: Much faster than my old micro SD card.
customer_reviews.text: Tripled my phone's speed. I stored a lot of my apps data on an older PNY 128gb micro SD card. My phone reads and writes to this card so much faster!
customer_reviews.author: mwyson

customer_reviews.title: 4k No Problem!
customer_reviews.text: Using in my gopro recording @ 4k no problem. Real world speeds at around 90MB+ a sec for write which is plenty
customer_reviews.author: Phaseshift

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: I use these instead of actual SD cards. That way I can use the Micro Sd card in my gopro, my dji drone, and my Sony cameras
customer_reviews.author: Triston Ioppini

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment to use with the GoPro. Gives you plenty of space to video.
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk has some of the best reviews. Appears to be a quality product at ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. ALWAYS buy a quality SD card. SanDisk has some of the best reviews. Appears to be a quality product at a very decent price. Don't leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly in my GoPro Hero (2018)
customer_reviews.text: This card worked perfectly in my GoPro Hero (2018). It's a SanDisk, so I have little worry about the longevity of the card, and so far have not had a single issue with recording and transferring photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Panaccio

customer_reviews.title: Works great, for wall mounted camera.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this SD Card in my wall mounted camera, On Medium setting it can hold about 11 days worth of continuous recording for me.
customer_reviews.author: KenFlynn25

customer_reviews.title: Nice high speed SD card
customer_reviews.text: These "Extreme 64GB SD cards work great with my action camera shooting 4K HD @ 60fps. No issues with buffering of any delays in writing to the card. Transfers to the PC are fairly quick as well, as fast the PC will support.
customer_reviews.author: pgaroni

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with sj6 legend sjcam
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong product? The box says uhs 1, but I ordered uhs 3... Doesn't work with my sjcam... There is '' memory error '' on the screen
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Brynskikh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some video files that I took from my Mavic pro are corrupted while others are not.
customer_reviews.author: miguelito

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a good product but I got a faulty piece
customer_reviews.text: It lasted very little time and stopped working, it does not let me format the card anymore, I can not erase or record more information on the card.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a back up for our cruise last month. Worked as expected and described.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Becker

customer_reviews.title: Very good micro sd
customer_reviews.text: I have never had problems with the memories of this category. good performance and duration
customer_reviews.author: Marlon García

customer_reviews.title: Adapter NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Adapter was not included! The description states the adapter is included. The picture also shows a package that includes an adapter. But the package I received was only the card. Pic of package is attached, my son already has the card in his camera. Card seems to work as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3monsterz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and works exactly as advertised. It's held up well for almost a year being used in a GoPro camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ben_E

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention to your product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the A1 card and got the cheaper A2 card. Not that its a bad card, but i paid for one i expect to get what i paid for!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JOSE AGRELO

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for a few weeks and now I get an errror and will not record. Wasters money
customer_reviews.author: The_Bulls

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Photo
customer_reviews.text: Misleading Photo Photo shows “Extreme Plus” while description says “Extreme”. I agree it was my mistake not realizing the image was different from the description. But my point is when I buy at Amazon, I should not be tricked with this type of cheap fraud
customer_reviews.author: Imanol Acha

customer_reviews.title: Great for video! Wifi camera compatible
customer_reviews.text: I think these work perfect with my wifi cameras. I have had no issues reviewing playback videos with this card. Great quality. Be sure to check what is the max sd card your device will take. Devices vary on how high a storage you can install.
customer_reviews.author: dennis m. wilhide jr.

customer_reviews.title: 64GByte version formatted to exFAT with 128KByte allocation unit tested ...
customer_reviews.text: 64GByte version formatted to exFAT with 128KByte allocation unit tested with H2testw showed 62.5MByte/s for writing and 77.1MByte/s for reading. Works well with GoPro HERO5 black at any settings.
customer_reviews.author: Zakharin Vyacheslav

customer_reviews.title: Sandisk Delivers
customer_reviews.text: Using the Sandisk 64gb micro sd with my new Yi 4K Action camera. Recommended by Yi. All scenes recorded with great color and clarity. Fast reading and writing. Bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Daniels

product_meta.title: SanDisk Extreme 64GB microSD, microSDHC, microSDXC, 4K UHD- SDSQXA2-064G-GN6MA, A1/A2
product_meta.description: Size:64GBCapture more fast action and record more Full HD or 4K UHD video with your Android based smartphone, interchangeable-lens camera, drone or GoPro action camera. The SanDisk Extreme microSDHC and microSDXC UHS-3 Cards are built tough for extreme durability under challenging environmental conditions. Extreme speeds let you capture every detail of adventure and take the wait out of transferring your videos between devices. Storage capacities from 32GB to 256GB expand your device's memory and let you record 4K UHD video. SanDisk products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SanDisk product.
feature_bullets: Ideal for 4K UHD and Full HD video2
SanDisk Memory Zone app for easy file management
Shock , temperature , water , and X ray proof

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,097 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
